21 class Unroller {

47 public:
48  Unroller(const char* suffix, Abstraction& abs, z3::context& c, z3::solver& s)
49  : m_sName(suffix), m_pAbstraction(&abs), m_pContext(&c), m_pSolver(&s),
50  m_nFrames(0),
51  m_mInputIndices(NUM_HASHTABLE_BUCKETS, nodeHash, nodeEqual),
52  m_mStateIndices(NUM_HASHTABLE_BUCKETS, nodeHash, nodeEqual),
53  m_pAssertion(NULL) {
54  newFrame();
55  setInit = true;
56  checkAbsNextExpNotNull();
57  }
58 
59  ~Unroller() { reset(NULL); }
60 
61  void Fr0Init(bool init) { setInit = init; }
62 
63  void setAssertion(z3::expr& a) { m_pAssertion = &a; }
64  z3::expr& getAssertion() { return *m_pAssertion; }
65 
66  void pushAssertion() {
67  z3::expr& a = getAssertion();
68  m_pSolver->add(a);
69  }
70 
72  void reset(z3::solver* solver) {
73  m_vPrimaryInputs.clear();
74  m_vOutputs.clear();
75 
76  m_Assumps.clear();
77 
78  m_nFrames = 0;
79 
80  if (solver) {
81  m_pSolver = solver;
82  newFrame();
83  }
84  }
85 
87  void addAssump(z3::expr& a) { m_Assumps.push_back(a); }
88 
90  std::vector<z3::expr>& getAssumps() { return m_Assumps; }
91 
92  void _initVar(Z3ExprAdapter& z3expr, const npair_t& p, int& cnt);
93 
94  unsigned frame() { return m_nFrames - 1; }
95 
96  void newFrame() {
97  m_nFrames++;
98  m_vPrimaryInputs.resize(m_nFrames);
99  m_vOutputs.resize(m_nFrames);
100  }
101 
102  unsigned frames() { return m_nFrames; }
103 
104  void addPrimaryInput(z3::expr in) {
105  m_vPrimaryInputs.at(frame()).push_back(in);
106  }
107 
108  z3::expr& getPrimaryInput(unsigned nFrame, int nNum) {
109  return m_vPrimaryInputs.at(nFrame)[nNum];
110  }
111 
112  std::vector<z3::expr>& getPrimaryInputs(unsigned nFrame) {
113  return m_vPrimaryInputs.at(nFrame);
114  }
115 
116  void addOutput(z3::expr out) { m_vOutputs.at(frame()).push_back(out); }
117 
118  z3::expr& getOutput(unsigned nFrame, Node* var) {
119  auto pos = m_mStateIndices.find(var);
120  ILA_ASSERT(pos != m_mStateIndices.end(), "Unable to find var in map.");
121  return getOutput(nFrame, pos->second);
122  }
123 
124  z3::expr& getOutput(unsigned nFrame, int nNum) {
125  return m_vOutputs.at(nFrame)[nNum];
126  }
127 
128  std::vector<z3::expr>& getOutputs(unsigned nFrame) {
129  return m_vOutputs.at(nFrame);
130  }
131  std::vector<std::vector<z3::expr>>& getAllOutputs() { return m_vOutputs; }
132 
133  void addTr() {
134  unsigned nFrame = frame();
135  if (nFrame == 0)
136  addTr0();
137  else
138  addTrN();
139  }
140 
141  // use the current frame to replace the variable in a node
142  z3::expr subsFormula(Node* n);
143  void static EvalEachFrame(z3::model& m, Unroller* u, std::ostream& cexf);
